mapper.sql: goods_id, goods_name, goods_type_id, supplier_id, title, goods_photo, price, beforeprice, unit, remain, introduce, goods_capacity, least_num, second_num, second_price, third_num, third_price
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from goods
order by ${orderByClause}
select goods.*, supplier.supplier_name ,goods_type.goods_type_name from goods ,supplier,goods_type where goods.goods_type_id = goods_type.goods_type_id and goods.supplier_id=supplier.supplier_id

select goods.*, supplier.supplier_name ,goods_type.goods_type_name from goods,supplier,goods_type
where goods.goods_type_id = goods_type.goods_type_id and goods.supplier_id=supplier.supplier_id limit #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT goods.* from goods where supplier_id=#{supplierId};
mapper.insert: insert into goods (goods_id, goods_name, goods_type_id, supplier_id, title, goods_photo, price, beforeprice, unit, remain, introduce, goods_capacity, least_num, second_num, second_price, third_num, third_price) values (#{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{beforeprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remain,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsCapacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{leastNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secondNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secondPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{thirdNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{thirdPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into goods
goods_id,
goods_name,
goods_type_id,
supplier_id,
title,
goods_photo,
price,
beforeprice,
unit,
remain,
introduce,
goods_capacity,
least_num,
second_num,
second_price,
third_num,
third_price,
#{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{beforeprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remain,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsCapacity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{leastNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{secondNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{secondPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{thirdNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{thirdPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update goods
goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_type_id = #{goodsTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_photo = #{goodsPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
beforeprice = #{beforeprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remain = #{remain,jdbcType=INTEGER},
introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_capacity = #{goodsCapacity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
least_num = #{leastNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
second_num = #{secondNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
second_price = #{secondPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
third_num = #{thirdNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
third_price = #{thirdPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update goods set goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_type_id = #{goodsTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_photo = #{goodsPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, beforeprice = #{beforeprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remain = #{remain,jdbcType=INTEGER}, introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_capacity = #{goodsCapacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, least_num = #{leastNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, second_num = #{secondNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, second_price = #{secondPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, third_num = #{thirdNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, third_price = #{thirdPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
